quotes: becoming an adviser of the Minister for Development in 1988
In 1990, he was in charge of the Development Ministry’s geographical coordination
taking the Director’s seat for the Ministry’s Development Programs in 1994
Severino’s career took an international turn in 1996 when he was appointed Director for Central Europe at the World Bank
From 1997 to 2000 he was the World Bank’s Vice-President for Asia
In 2000 Jean-Michel Severino returned to France for an appointment as the Inspector-General of Finance in the Ministry of Economy, Finance and Industry in Paris
In 2001, he was appointed Chief Executive Officer of the Agence Francaise de Developpement
from which he graduated in 1984
